data.title: Electronic Arts Locations
data.text:
Known as the Gateway to the North, Edmonton is the proud home of EA’s BioWare studio. This lovely city is the northernmost metropolis in North America and the birthplace of legendary titles like Anthem and Mass Effect.

Bienvenue à Montréal, where you’ll find incredible poutine, art, and a thriving tech community. At EA Montreal, you’ll find a plethora of teams, including: Motive Studios, a Frostbite game engine team, as well as many development support and corporate teams, such as Market Research and Analytics, UXR, CDS, SEED, and Audioworks.

Be at the heart of play at EA’s Redwood Shores campus. Affectionately known as EARS, this 22-acre facility is our global headquarters. As one of the largest interactive entertainment companies in the world, this is our nucleus for inspiring the world to play. Our HQ is home to many teams, including EA Mobile, Maxis, Marketing, Technology, Finance, Publishing, and Competitive Gaming.

The hidden NorCal gem of Sacramento is a bustling but manageable city that offers a little something for everyone. And the capital of California is also home to EA’s Capital Games, a mobile gaming company that creates immersive RPG experiences.

One of the coolest PNW cities is where you'll find EA Vancouver (EAV). This campus is the center for development of several of EA's largest franchises, including EA SPORTS FC, NHL, and UFC, Plants Vs. Zombies and Need for Speed. This location also houses development support teams and corporate teams, such as Finance, HR & Facilities, and Legal, and a motion capture lab.

Located in the heart of Silicon Valley, you'll find a group of passionate, sports-loving mobile game enthusiasts who make up GluSports studio – creators of the MLB Tap Sports Baseball franchise. In Glu's Foster City office, you'll find no shortage of teamwork, homeruns and dogs in the office. In addition to four-legged coworkers, you'll also find developers, animators and more.

Home to the Golden Gate Bridge and the birthplace of Mission-style burritos, San Francisco is a vibrant hub of technology and creativity. And it's where studios like Glunies, GluPlay and Crowdstar bring world-class experiences to life for players all around the world. This location is also home to support and corporate teams.

Toronto is an international centre of business, finance, arts, and culture; recognized as one of the most multicultural and cosmopolitan cities in the world. It's no surprise that creativity rules at the Glu Toronto studio. This studio is home to artists, engineers, customer care and other central teams that bring casual games like Kim Kardashian: Hollywood and Design Home to life.

Welcome to the "Valley of the Stars," where it's always 10 degrees warmer and windier than any other part of LA! Also known as "The Valley" of LA, Respawn Entertainment is proud to call one of the world's entertainment capitals home. Here, we work on Titanfall, Apex Legends, Star Wars Jedi, and Medal of Honor.

Located near Pasadena's Charming Old Town district, you'll find Industrial Toys, the masterminds committed to creating the world's best mobile games for core gamers. Our office is at the center of a thriving tech scene nestled among the palms, but without LA's pesky traffic and high cost of living. Now, working closely with DICE, the team is developing a completely new Battlefield game bringing all-out warfare to the world of mobile gaming.

EA Hyderabad is both a dynamic business operation and a rapidly growing technology center. Located in Hi-Tech City, the office is home to talented and passionate individuals from all over the world. Four major global business units are located here: EA Mobile Studios Slingshot, Global Finance Shared Services, Central Technology Organization (Including Enterprise Platform Services and Creative & Development), and Worldwide Customer Experience.

Voted the world’s most liveable city six years in a row, Melbourne also boasts the title of coffee capital of the world. This vibrant, coastal city is where EA’s FireMonkeys Studio and Frostbite team make their home.

The constantly innovative birthplace of K-Pop and the Korean Wave is where our Korean office can be found. EA's Seoul office is home to EA Korea, Publishing, QA, Legal, and various other organizations. The EA Korea studio focuses on delivering the most realistic game experience for our players through EA SPORTS FC Online 3.

Based in the heart of Shanghai's central business district in Jing’an, EA China is home to a number of EA's key organizations such as EA SPORTS FC Mobile Shanghai Studio, EA Create, EA Digital Platform (EADP), Great China Publishing, Partnered Development Group (PDG), Quality, Verification & Standards (QVS), Data and Analytics (DnA). This collaborative international team provides opportunities to work on EA's hottest IPs such as EA SPORTS FC, Plants vs. Zombies, Need for Speed, etc.

The land down under is on top of the food, music and arts scene in beautiful and bustling Sydney. EA’s Sydney office is home to our talented Marketing & Communications, Sales, and Finance teams. These teams work with some of the biggest and most innovative video game franchises and studios in the world, bringing players even closer to the games they love.

Codemasters' home is Plaza Sentral, a cutting-edge business complex set in the Kl Sentral district of the federal territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Amidst the bustle and tropical heat, our creative talent builds worlds and dream machines for multiple Codemasters projects. The studio attracts industry veterans from all over the world, and has a proud reputation for nurturing new talent and launching countless careers.

EA Bucharest is one of the largest and most diverse tech companies in Romania. It's home to many successful teams, including EA SPORTS (Development), working on FC and NHL franchises; Creative & Development (C&D), creating some of the most beloved games and supporting our ongoing live services and the Frostbite engine development team; MCP (Marketing Commercial Positive Play); and corporate functions such as Finance, IT, People Experience (PE), and Workplace Experience (WE).

Situated on the banks of the river Rhine in one of Germany’s oldest cities is EA Cologne. This office houses a number of different business groups, including Publishing, EA Mobile, Development Services and corporate functions such as Finance, Technology and HR.

By the luck of the Irish, we’re also in Ireland, too. Located in Western Ireland, EA Galway is home to a diverse range of teams, predominantly EA’s Worldwide Customer Experience (WWCE), Quality Assurance, Quality Engineering and EA’s Digital Platform (EADP) businesses. Galway’s Worldwide Customer Experience Center provides support to our gamers across Europe 24/7.

Sweden’s second largest city is home to EA Gothenburg. This charming location was chosen because of the plethora of highly talented game developers that can be found in this part of Sweden. With all the agility and creativity of a start-up, EA Gothenburg still gives employees the chance to work with industry giants like DICE and Criterion, letting this studio execute amazing creative and technical visions.

27 miles southwest of London, you’ll find the central hub for gaming in the UK in the picturesque town of Guildford. EA Guildford is home to multiple business groups, including: International Publishing, Global Marketing, Development Services (Quality Engineering & Quality Assurance), as well as a number of corporate functions including Finance, IT, People Experience & Workplaces, and Legal. This location also houses the Criterion Games development studio.

At the center of all roads in Spain is Madrid. This capital city boasts the best calamari sandwiches and an amazing football team, as well as EA Madrid. This office is home to our main Localization studio, an EA SPORTS Madrid development studio and many other important teams, including, International Publishing, People Experience & Workplaces, IT, and Finance.

Our Birmingham team is busy working away on our official BAFTA award-winning F1® series in their new home at Alpha Tower in the heart of the city centre. When it comes to our F1® franchise, our passionate team brings players closer to the action than ever before. Each iteration innovates to bring players new and exciting experiences, letting them live their dream of lining up alongside their heroes from the worlds of F1® and F2™. The F1® franchise is one of the highest-scoring of all time, according to Metacritic.

Just 13 miles south of Manchester and a 15-minute train journey, is the attractive market town of Wilmslow. Here amongst the boutique shops and independent cafes and bars is the stunning Playdemic studio. Acquired by EA in 2021, Playdemic is home to the top 10 grossing, BAFTA winning mobile smash - Golf Clash. Having opened at the beginning of 2020, our award-winning, bespoke studio space offers conventional desk space as well as indulgent breakout areas, meeting rooms and alternative workspaces. The office has been designed to create an environment that encourages and allows our team to do their very best work.
